import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItem.css' import {ShopContext} from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { const{all_product,cartItmes,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Product

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItmes[e.id]>0) { return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

${e.new_price*cartItmes[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} alt="" />
} return null; })}

Cart Totals

Subtotal

${0}

Shipping fee

Free

total

${0}

DIV
) } export default CartItems
